choiceGame - Static variable in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_menu.Main
 
choiceMode - Static variable in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_menu.Main
 
codeFound - Variable in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Games
is true when the mystery code has been broken by the challenger
codeInputUser() - Method in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Game1
This method inputs the code entered by the player on the keyboard, tests that the code is only made of digits and that the length of the input is identical to the value of instance field Games.nbDigits and returns the valid code.
codeInputUser() - Method in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Game2
This method inputs the code entered by the player on the keyboard, tests that the code is only made of digits, that the length of the input is identical to the value of instance field Games.nbDigitsand additionally tests that the nb of variations is valid Games.nbVariations
codeInputUser() - Method in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Games
This method inputs the code entered by the player on the keyboard test its validity and return it
codeProposal - Variable in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Games
This is code attempt made by the player (mode challenger) or the computer (mode defender)
codeToBeFound - Variable in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Games
This is the mystery code to be found, created by the computer (mode challenger) or by the player (mode defender)
com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses - package com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses
 
com.berthoud.oc_project3_menu - package com.berthoud.oc_project3_menu
 
creationPoolCombinations() - Method in class com.berthoud.oc_project3_gameclasses.Game2ModeDefender
This method is used for the AI part.
